external_games.name: A College of Thirst & Claws - Season 1

name: A College of Thirst & Claws: Season 1
summary: An immersive, story-driven adult visual novel. As a werewolf joining a supernatural college, you'll be thrown into the deep end of a sinister conspiracy in the town of Lanstone. Develop relationships with beautiful women as you shape the story with your choices.
